name: Ring of Protection
description: A Ring of Protection is a magical ring that, when worn, enhances the wearer's defense and increases their chances of avoiding harm by bolstering their armor class.

name: Ring of Invisibility
description: The Ring of Invisibility grants the wearer the ability to become invisible at will, allowing them to move unseen and evade detection.

name: Ring of Strength
description: A Ring of Strength is a magical ring that, when worn, enhances the wearer's physical power, allowing them to perform feats of strength beyond their normal capabilities.

name: Ring of Regeneration
description: A Ring of Regeneration is a magical ring that grants the wearer the ability to heal wounds over time, restoring a small amount of health each turn.

name: Ring of Spell Storing
description: A Ring of Spell Storing is a magical ring that allows the wearer to store spells for later use. The ring can hold up to five levels of spells, which can be cast by the wearer without expending their own spell slots.

name: Ring of Feather Falling
description: A Ring of Feather Falling is a magical ring that allows the wearer to fall gently from great heights, preventing damage from falls and ensuring a safe landing.

name: Ring of Water Walking
description: A Ring of Water Walking is a magical ring that allows the wearer to walk on the surface of water as if it were solid ground, enabling them to traverse lakes, rivers, and oceans with ease.

name: Ring of Teleportation
description: A Ring of Teleportation is a magical ring that allows the wearer to instantly transport themselves to a previously visited location, making it a valuable tool for quick escapes or strategic repositioning.

name: Ring of Fire Resistance
description: A Ring of Fire Resistance is a magical ring that grants the wearer protection against fire-based attacks, reducing damage taken from fire spells and effects.

name: Ring of Mind Shielding
description: A Ring of Mind Shielding is a magical ring that protects the wearer from mental intrusion and psychic attacks, ensuring that their thoughts remain private and their mind is fortified against manipulation.

name: Ring of Invisibility Detection
description: The Ring of Invisibility Detection is a magical ring that grants the wearer the ability to sense invisible creatures and objects within a certain radius, allowing them to detect hidden threats.

name: Ring of Sustenance
description: The Ring of Sustenance is a magical ring that allows the wearer to go without food and water for extended periods of time, providing the necessary nourishment and hydration through magical means.

name: Ring of Elemental Control
description: The Ring of Elemental Control is a powerful magical artifact that grants the wearer the ability to manipulate elemental forces. With this ring, the wearer can summon and control fire, water, earth, and air, allowing for devastating attacks or protective barriers.

name: Ring of the Ram
description: The Ring of the Ram is a powerful magical ring that allows the wearer to unleash a forceful blast of energy, capable of pushing back enemies and breaking down barriers.

name: Ring of Telekinesis
description: A Ring of Telekinesis grants the wearer the ability to manipulate objects at a distance, allowing them to move, lift, or throw items without physical contact.
